comments.author: angela
comments.body: disabling user(s) (except for the administrator user) can be achieve by calling User#disable(String reason). A disabled user will not be able to login to the repository any more (unless enabled again) and cannot be impersonated. however, a disabled user can still be retrieved and modified by the user management api.

description: add "disable user" functionality to prevent an existing user from login into the repository.
